page.title: 10 From Nordley to School
page.content:
I live in{Nordley}at a house called {Rosemary Cottage.}Every morning I have to{get up early}and at{8.30 a.m.}I am ready for my{lift}into{Bridgnorth}, {2.9}miles away. If I lived{3}miles away I would get{free}transport.
At{8.55}we go into{school}and have {Assembly,}then we do our{work}which is set on the{blackboard}and as long as it all gets done we can do it in{any {order.
At{12 noon}it is{Dinnertime.}The children that have{school dinners}eat first, and afterwards the{sandwich children eat theirs.After dinner we work on, or do{games}or go{swimming until we{finish}school at{3.30.
We come to school{each weekday,}but {not}on{Saturdays}or{Sundays.
